display_long_description:
# Anomaly is the ultimate high-stakes PvPvE extraction shooter.

**“Only the sharp, the strong, and the fortunate make it out alive—will you?”**



#  ENTER THE EXCLUSION ZONE
Welcome to 2050. As a newly recruited Temp, you dive into the Exclusion Zone—the abandoned heart of a once-thriving town.
Your mission: tackle assignments from the shadowy Conway Group, who fund you but hide dangerous truths. Go solo or team up to search, loot, and battle for the ultimate prize: the Artifact. Once it's in your hands, brace yourself – everyone will be coming for you. 
[media]

# RISK BIG, WIN BIG
In every match there are new weapons, and gear to discover. Scavenge, trade, and upgrade until you strike fear into all who dare face you. But remember—the more you bring into a match, the more you risk losing.
Succeed, and the spoils are yours. Fail, and you lose everything. 
[media]

# PLAN YOUR STRATEGY
In the Exclusion Zone, your choices define your survival. Take on short, low-risk contracts for small rewards, or dive deeper for bigger payoffs. Will you complete your mission quickly and escape, or risk it all for rare loot? Time is ticking, and the Anomaly is closing in. 

[media]

# YOUR ARSENAL. YOUR WAY.
Customize your weapons with optics, grips, stocks and more to create the perfect loadout. Tactical tools like grav grenades and deployable cover can turn any firefight in your favor.
